title: The Magic Rock movie data
description: The data used to load movie recommendations

movies.cast: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Scott, Graham McTavish, William Kircher

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movies.summary: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.
movies.cast: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Scott, Graham McTavish, William Kircher

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
movies.summary: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.
movies.cast: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Scott, Graham McTavish, William Kircher

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain"" Jack Sparrow to save his love
movies.cast: the governor's daughter

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
movies.summary: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.
movies.cast: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport, Bill Nighy, Jonathan Pryce

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movies.summary: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.
movies.cast: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport, Bill Nighy, Jonathan Pryce

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
movies.summary: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.
movies.cast: Johnny Depp, Penelope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush, Ian McShane, Kevin McNally, Sam Claflin

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
movies.summary: Captain Jack Sparrow is pursued by old rival Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the Devil's Triangle. They're determined to kill every pirate at sea...notably Jack.
movies.cast: Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Brenton Thwaites, Kaya Scodelario, Kevin McNally

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
movies.summary: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.
movies.cast: Richard Harris, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Tom Felton

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
movies.summary: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

movies.cast: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Tom Felton, Timothy Spall, David Tennant, Eric Sykes

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movies.summary: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
movies.summary: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince"" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past."
movies.cast: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Tom Felton, Alan Rickman, Michael Gambon, Timothy Spall, David Tennant, Eric Sykes

movies.title: Jurassic Park

movies.title: Transporter 2
movies.summary: Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.
movies.cast: Jason Statham, Alessandro Gassmann, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta

movies.title: Transporter 3
movies.summary: Frank Martin is forced to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery.
movies.cast: Jason Statham, Natalya Rudakova, Francois Berleand, Robert Knepper

movies.title: The Mechanic
movies.summary: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.
movies.cast: Jason Statham, Ben Foster, Tony Goldwyn, Donald Sutherland, Jeff Chase

movies.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
movies.summary: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.
movies.cast: Jason Statham, Jessica Alba, Tommy Lee Jones, Michelle Yeoh, Sam Hazeldine

movies.title: Parker
movies.summary: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.
movies.cast: Jason Statham, Jennifer Lopez, Michael Chiklis, Wendell Pierce, Clifton Collins Jr.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda
movies.summary: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.
movies.cast: Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane, Jackie Chan, Seth Rogen, Lucy Liu, David Cross

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
movies.summary: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.
movies.cast: Jack Black, Angelina Jolie, Dustin Hoffman, Gary Oldman, Jackie Chan, Seth Rogan, Lucy Liu, David Cross

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
movies.summary: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness""
movies.cast: Po must face two hugely epic
movies.trailer: but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to home."

movies.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
movies.summary: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal control officer.
movies.cast: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith, Sacha Baron Cohen, Cedric the Entertainer, Andy Richter

movies.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
movies.summary: The Madagascar animals fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African nature reserve, where they meet others of their own kind, and Alex especially discovers his royal heritage as prince of a lion pride.
movies.cast: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith, Sacha Baron Cohen, Cedric the Entertainer, Andy Richter

movies.title: Madagascar
movies.summary: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.
movies.cast: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith, Sacha Baron Cohen, Cedric the Entertainer, Andy Richter

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.summary: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.
movies.cast: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand, Julie Andrews, Will Arnett, Kristen Wiig, Miranda Cosgrove

movies.title: Despicable Me 2
movies.summary: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.
movies.cast: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove, Russell Brand, Ken Jeong

movies.title: Despicable Me 3
movies.summary: Gru meets his long-lost, charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru, who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.
movies.cast: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Trey Parker, Miranda Cosgrove, Steve Coogan, Julie Andrews

movies.title: Minions
movies.summary: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.
movies.cast: Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Michael Keaton, Allison Janney, Steve Coogan, Jennifer Saunders, Geoffrey Rush, Steve Carell
